name: CPU K3s Deployment
description: Template for configuring and deploying a K3s type worker node and connect it to a master node.

parameters.host: IP or hostname where the master node resides.
parameters.port: The port on which the cluster is exposed on.
parameters.token: The token for connecting the worker node to the master node.
parameters.version: The version, in major.minor.patch format, for Kubernetes tools that will be installed.
